name: code-index-mcp
description: Fast local source code searching using Zoekt trigram-based indexing
long_description: An MCP server that provides fast local source code searching using Zoekt's trigram-based indexing. Features include per-directory indexes, rich query language with regex support, file and language filters, and cross-platform compatibility.

tools.name: index_directory
tools.description: Index a source code directory for fast searching

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: Search for code across indexed directories using Zoekt query syntax

tools.name: list_indexes
tools.description: List all indexed directories and their status

tools.name: delete_index
tools.description: Delete the index for a specific directory

tools.name: index_info
tools.description: Get information about the indexing configuration
